item.title: Mar 26
item.description: Prompt: Act as if you were a developer, write a post on how to stay productive by using nowadays technologies Mar 26 [!tldr] Mar 26 TLDR Text is too short to sumarize As a busy programmer and project manager, I know how important it is to be efficient and focused to get things done. Here are some nowaday technologies that can help you stay productive: Productivity software: There are several productivity software tools out there, such as Trello, Asana, Monday, and Monday.
